00019 #ifndef __UTIL_HASH_H__
00020 #define __UTIL_HASH_H__
00021 
00022 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00023 
00024 static inline unsigned int hash_int_2d(unsigned int kx, unsigned int ky)
00025 {
00026     #define rot(x,k) (((x)<<(k)) | ((x)>>(32-(k))))
00027 
00028     unsigned int a, b, c;
00029 
00030     a = b = c = 0xdeadbeef + (2 << 2) + 13;
00031     a += kx;
00032     b += ky;
00033 
00034     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,14);
00035     a ^= c; a -= rot(c,11);
00036     b ^= a; b -= rot(a,25);
00037     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,16);
00038     a ^= c; a -= rot(c,4);
00039     b ^= a; b -= rot(a,14);
00040     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,24);
00041 
00042     return c;
00043 
00044     #undef rot
00045 }
00046 
00047 static inline unsigned int hash_int(unsigned int k)
00048 {
00049     return hash_int_2d(k, 0);
00050 }
00051 
00052 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
00053 
00054 #endif /* __UTIL_HASH_H__ */
